summary: Major UI overhaul verification complete: All 12 requested features verified working. Login redirects to /app/chat, white background for main content, dark sidebar with PRO badges, mascot branding, usage limits, and pricing page with 3 tiers.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Login page shows 'eka-aı' branding (with stylized characters - orange hyphen and dotless i)
TEST 2: Login with testuser@test.com / test123456 redirects to /app/chat (NOT /app/dashboard) ✓
TEST 3: Chat page has WHITE/LIGHT background (bg-[#FAFAFA]) ✓
TEST 4: Sidebar is DARK (bg-[#0D0D0D]) with mascot logo and 'eka-aı' branding ✓
TEST 5: Sidebar shows FREE features: Chat, Search, Open Job Card, Invoices ✓
TEST 6: Sidebar shows PRO features with lock icon: Dashboard, Fleet Mgmt, PDI Checklist ✓
TEST 7A: Upgrade button visible in sidebar (View Plans card) ✓
TEST 7B: Upgrade button visible in topbar ✓
TEST 8B: TopBar shows 'eka-aı' branding with white background (bg-white/95) ✓
TEST 9: /pricing page shows 3 plans: STARTER ₹1,499, GROWTH ₹2,999, ELITE ₹5,999 ✓
TEST 10: Chat page shows usage indicator (10 queries left today) with Upgrade link ✓
TEST 11: /app/search page loads correctly with search input field ✓
TEST 12: Clicking PRO feature (Dashboard) redirects to /pricing ✓

mocked_api_notes.payment_gateway: Shows alert instead of actual payment

context_for_next_testing_agent: UI overhaul complete. All major changes verified: 1) Login redirects to /app/chat instead of dashboard. 2) Main content area is WHITE (#FAFAFA). 3) Sidebar is DARK (#0D0D0D) with mascot and eka-aı branding. 4) Dashboard, Fleet Mgmt, PDI are marked PRO with lock icons. 5) Chat shows usage limits (10 queries/day). 6) Pricing page shows 3 tiers (STARTER ₹1,499, GROWTH ₹2,999, ELITE ₹5,999). 7) PRO features redirect to /pricing.

verified_components.LoginPage: Dark theme, eka-aı branding, email/password form, Google login button, redirects to /app/chat
verified_components.EkaSidebar: Dark (#0D0D0D), mascot logo (4px border-radius), eka-aı branding, FREE nav items (Chat, Search, Open Job Card, Invoices), PRO nav items with lock badges (Dashboard, Fleet Mgmt, PDI Checklist), Upgrade to Pro card
verified_components.EkaTopBar: White background (bg-white/95), mascot (4px border-radius), eka-aı branding, Upgrade button, Gemini Flash mode selector, notifications bell, user avatar
verified_components.EkaChatPage: Light background (#FAFAFA), mascot welcome image, usage indicator (10 queries left), 4 suggestion chips (1 marked PRO), Automobile Domain Locked badge, chat input
verified_components.PricingPage: 3 pricing tiers (STARTER ₹1,499, GROWTH ₹2,999, ELITE ₹5,999), feature comparison, FAQs, Pay-Per-Job Add-on (₹49)
verified_components.EkaSearchPage: Light background, search input, filters (All, Job Cards, Invoices, Customers, Vehicles), Recent Searches
